thread.title: Man Robbed, Then Struck By Car In South LA Hit-And-Run
thread.title_full: Man Robbed, Then Struck By Car In South LA Hit-And-Run

author: CBS Los Angeles
title: Man Robbed, Then Struck By Car In South LA Hit-And-Run
text:
Man Robbed, Then Struck By Car In South LA Hit-And-Run February 5, 2017 12:30 PM 
SOUTH LA (CBSLA.com) â€” Authorities say an investigation is underway after a man was robbed and then struck by a hit-and-run driver in South Los Angeles. 
The victim was rushed to the hospital where he was listed in critical condition. He was expected to survive. 
The incident unfolded around 2:20 a.m. Sunday on Western Avenue near 59th Street. The man was not in the crosswalk at the time of the crash. 
So far, no witnesses have come forward. 
No further information was immediately available.
